name: CQ.Ext.SplitBar.AbsoluteLayoutAdapter
doc:
Adapter that  moves the splitter element to align with the resized sizing element.
Used with an a...

props.name: SplitBar.AbsoluteLayoutAdapter.BOTTOM
props.doc: <static> Placement constant - The resizing element is positioned under splitter element

props.name: SplitBar.AbsoluteLayoutAdapter.HORIZONTAL
props.doc: <static> Orientation constant - Create a horizontal SplitBar

props.name: SplitBar.AbsoluteLayoutAdapter.LEFT
props.doc: <static> Placement constant - The resizing element is to the left of the splitter element

props.name: SplitBar.AbsoluteLayoutAdapter.RIGHT
props.doc: <static> Placement constant - The resizing element is to the right of the splitter element

props.name: SplitBar.AbsoluteLayoutAdapter.TOP
props.doc: <static> Placement constant - The resizing element is positioned above the splitter element

props.name: SplitBar.AbsoluteLayoutAdapter.VERTICAL
props.doc: <static> Orientation constant - Create a vertical SplitBar

methods.name: getElementSize
methods.doc: Called before drag operations to get the current size of the resizing element.

methods.name: setElementSize
methods.doc: Called after drag operations to set the size of the resizing element.
